column4: is it just me or is the youtube video player totally messed up in ubuntu?!?
it hardly works
cant even pause or play the video
using 64 bit?
yep
Try this ppa https://launchpad.net/~sevenmachines/+archive/flash
ppa's bah...
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:sevenmachines/flash && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install flashplugin64-nonfree
you sure it works? dont wanna mess up more than it already is - somone once mentioned a config setting that can fix certain problems too
am i required to uninstall the current flashplugin before i do sudo add-apt-repository ppa:sevenmachines/flash && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install flashplugin64-nonfree
It will do everything for you
How did you install the current flash?
erm just aptitude and the repos
The new one will uninstall the old one for you
i dont even know the name of the current one - is it flashplugin installer?!
I am telling you. you can just install the new one. It will remove the old one. The package too.
tried to get it from the PPA (after uninstalling flashplugin-installer :/ ) i get ... an error: E: Couldn't find package flashplugin64-nonfree
sudo apt-get flashplugin64-installer
you are a genius
You need to restart the browser to take effect
stop it ! im flattered by your igeniuity
Good it works
